WorkItem.Description: Based on relative stat values it appears Elixir of the Master + Elixir of Deep Earth is better than Flask of the Winds. I'd like to see them modeled to verify. Given the cost of flasks now it may actually be cheaper or at least not terribly more expensive to double Elixir rather than Flask.

Comments.Message:
I've added them in and did a quick comparison using Astry's Bear:
1686323 Winds
1678623 Master+Deep Earth

Was mixology added for them as well?  

Certainly with threat importance turned down they will win then if it's that close.  I find I have too much threat and I have to stand around not attacking on taunt swap fights as it is.
I added the Mixology bonuses to Rawr but did not add them to those numbers.
